definition[0]: irreconcilable positions etc are so strongly opposed to each other that it is not possible for them to reach an agreement
example[0]: The differences between the landowners and the conservationists were irreconcilable from the start.
definition[1]: if two beliefs or ideas are irreconcilable, it is not possible to believe both of them
example[1]: This belief was irreconcilable with the Churchâ€™s doctrine of salvation.
